Class ManagerSidebarController

java.lang.Object
com.group18.controller.manager.ManagerSidebarController
public class ManagerSidebarController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the sidebar functionality for a manager's interface. It handles the navigation between different views such as Dashboard, Inventory, Staff, Pricing, and Revenue, as well as user information display and logout functionality.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the sidebar component of the Manager interface. This method configures hover animations for all navigation buttons within the sidebar, enhancing the user experience by adding visual feedback when the user interacts with the buttons. The animations include scaling, translation, and shadow effects. Buttons included: - Inventory - Staff - Pricing - Revenue - Logout

    • initializeUserInfo

      private void initializeUserInfo()
      Initializes user-related information for the sidebar. Displays the user's full name and role on the interface if the currently

    • setupSidebarHoverAnimation

      public static void setupSidebarHoverAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Configures hover and click animations for a sidebar button. This method enhances the interactivity of the button by applying visual effects such as scaling, translation, and shadowing when the user hovers over, clicks, or releases the button.
      Parameters:
      button - the Button for which the hover and click animations need to be applied

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User user)
      Sets the current user for the ManagerSidebarController

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(ManagerController controller)
      Sets the main controller for this sidebar controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - the main controller to be assigned
